description: ConsoleNotificationSpec is the desired console notification configuration.

backgroundColor.description: backgroundColor is the color of the background for the notification as CSS data type color.

color.description: color is the color of the text for the notification as CSS data type color.

link.description: link is an object that holds notification link details.

location.description: location is the location of the notification in the console. Valid values are: "BannerTop", "BannerBottom", "BannerTopBottom".

text.description: text is the visible text of the notification.
